name: Ext_R4_Composition_ev_code
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.Composition.event.code for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Composition.event.code from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Code(s) that apply to the event being documented
element.definition: This list of codes represents the main clinical acts, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented. In some cases, the event is inherent in the typeCode, such as a "History and Physical Report" in which the procedure being documented is necessarily a "History and Physical" act.
element.comment: `Composition.event.code` has no related element in R5:Composition

element.short: Code(s) that apply to the event being documented

In some cases, the event is inherent in the typeCode, such as a "History and Physical Report" in which the procedure being documented is necessarily a "History and Physical" act.
element.comment: `Composition.event.code` has no related element in R5:Composition

binding.description: This list of codes represents the main clinical acts being documented.
